How many people are affected by familial porencephaly ?,"Familial porencephaly is a rare condition, although the exact prevalence is unknown. At least eight affected families have been described in the scientific literature.",GHR,familial porencephaly
What are the genetic changes related to familial porencephaly ?,"Mutations in the COL4A1 gene cause familial porencephaly. The COL4A1 gene provides instructions for making one
